name: Fantasy Master Arena
description:
Fantasy Master Arena

Unleash your strategic potential in epic card battles
Fantasy Master Arena is a card battle game that combines the excitement of traditional TCG/CCG and convenience of modern mobile games.

The game was launched at 1:00 p.m. (13:00) on February 17 this year. 

Fantasy Master Arena is a turn-based strategic card battle game
that features an unpredictable Coin system and hidden Magic cards that encourage strategic play. With 6 cards in your hand, and the optional risk of shuffling,
you can sue diverse and powerful card combinations to decimate your enemy!
▶ Available to download from Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.gamtory.fmarena
▶ Official Community Website: https://gamtory.blogspot.com

■■■ Features ■■■

▶ Diverse and powerful card combinations that can wipe out all enemy cards
Apply invincibility buff to your Unit card, then send it out to crush your foes. Equip your Unit card with a weapon, then multiply them for a groups Unit cards, all armed with that weapon.
Use magic to duplicate your attack magic to deal twice as much damage.
Diverse and powerful card combinations add strategic depth,
as well as a chance to make a comeback at the last second.

▶ 6 cards in your hand and a chance to shuffle on each turn
No matter how many cards you use, you get 6 cards in your hand on the next turn.
You don’t have to hold on to each and every card; you can just save them for later. At each turn, you have a chance to shuffle your cards. This could help you get a powerful combination of cards and carry out your strategy more easily. 

▶ Coin system and hidden Magic cards that encourage strategic play
Hidden magic cards encourage strategic play and mind games.
If you have Souls left, you can trick your opponent into thinking you’ve got a surprise for them.
Units toss a coin to increase their stats before launching their attack.
These mechanics make the gameplay more unpredictable and exciting. 

▶ 581 cards at launch, with 140 new cards added every two months!
There are 581 different cards at launch. As you can have up to 3 of the same cards, you can play with 1,743 types of cards in total.
How many strategies can you perform with 1,743 cards? Also, 140 new cards will be added every two months through a massive update. The game is scheduled to launch in North America, Europe, Japan, and China in 2019. 

▶ No need to “Pay to Win!”
Fantasy Master Arena doesn’t encourage excessive in-app purchases. Players have access to all cards and game content without paying cash. With the Dust generated from redundant cards, you can use the Craft system and get the cards you want more easily. In-app purchases have no effect on the gameplay; they only allow you to save time and get cards more easily.
